definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.chinese: 那這三觀亭到底是哪三觀啊？

sentences.english: I hoped the carefree young girl in the lotus flower station ugg short thought of to together smile.
sentences.chinese: 我望着荷花亭中無憂無慮的少女，想起了齊笑。

sentences.english: Well, the company has been experimenting with what it calls a "Makeout Booth."
sentences.chinese: 他們公司對一個稱作“販賣亭”的產品進行試驗。

sentences.english: At the top, there is a viewing balcony which overlooks the road and the Stigfossen waterfall, a 320 m long waterfall which falls down the mountain side.
sentences.chinese: 在山頂的觀景亭可俯瞰山路和320米長的瀑布。

sentences.english: Opposite to the bench is Kwan Kung Temple.
sentences.chinese: 石櫈的對面，就是關公亭。

sentences.english: People enter the booth and draw the curtain closed.
sentences.chinese: 人們進入攝影亭，拉上簾子。

sentences.english: Its beams bear colored paintings illustrating the story about Fan the Small Man.
sentences.chinese: 亭內橫樑上彩繪“範小人”傳奇故事。

sentences.english: We eat again this year on Beihai Pavilion noodle soup.
sentences.chinese: 我們今年又喫上了北海亭的清湯麪啦。

sentences.english: Theres a tollbooth up ahead. Wheres the change?
sentences.chinese: 前面有收費亭，零錢在哪裏？

sentences.english: Beihai pavilion every day, from early in the morning is always so busy.
sentences.chinese: 北海亭每逢這一天，總是從一大早就忙得不可開交。

sentences.english: This is the triangular pavilion at the Moonlight Reflected in the Three Towers scenic spot.
sentences.chinese: 這就是如今西湖三潭印月景區的三角亭。

sentences.english: A choice of settings includes the villa's romantic pavilion over the water or onboard the yacht.
sentences.chinese: 選擇的設置，包括別墅的水或在船上的遊艇浪漫亭。

sentences.english: Trincomalee bristles with soldiers and checkpoints.
sentences.chinese: 亭可馬裏處處都是士兵和關卡。

sentences.english: Personal information "kiosks, " in the mast, and one double.
sentences.chinese: 設定檔的信息亭，在單，雙桅杆。

sentences.english: Go into a sticker photo booth.
A kiosk showing a printed map of downtown, for example, is information in the world.
sentences.chinese: 例如，公用信息亭張貼的城鎮地圖就是世界中的消息。
